oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In this position paper we explore how new capabilites of mobile devices could be used to setup distributed multi-user mobile applications with potentially high interest for end users. We describe an example of such an application by transposing Internet social network trends and principles to a mobile ad hoc environment. Then we present a tentative design and implentation sketch of this application in terms of the MUSIC context-aware adaptation middleware we are currently developing.
